scenario_text.value: Yaaah!
(Miyuki’s collapsed! Is it...over?)
We did it! We won! We won, Sis!

We’ve freed her from his clutches at last!
Hang in there, Miyuki!
Unnngh...
Miyuki! Come on!

...Haru? That’s you, isn’t it? You’re all
grown up...
I’m sorry...I gave you so much trouble!

No, it’s fine. I’m just happy we get to be
together again like this.
I finally managed to save you, Miyuki...
Sis...
Heheh. That’s my Haru.
Everyone... You’re here. You all came.
Miyuki, I’m so glad you’re all right!
Takuma... Everyone, please...

You have to help the Master. You have to save
Haruchika.
Save him? What are you talking about, Miyuki?
He did such terrible things to you!

The Master holds a grudge over being made into
a sacrifice. That’s undeniable.

But that’s not really what happened.
Haruchika is mistaken.
He was never truly abandoned.

You should let Master Haruchika himself tell
you what happened.
Wait... Do you all know something?
It is not for us to say.
However, all of you will soon learn.
Learn wha—?
Professor?!
Wah?!
Yeek!
Guys?!
They just...disappeared. Why?
It begins. He calls us.

So, this is it. Let’s go, Takuma. We need to
stop Haruchika.

Miyuki? What do you mean? Go where? What is
it he doesn’t under—?
